pullrequest.title: Add joint properties to property panel

content.raw: mm ya we'll have to query the gzserver if we want to get joint angle information. So at the moment the model properties in the tree don't get updated when the they are changed by another client right? We can tackle this in a separate pull request.
content.html: mm ya we'll have to query the gzserver if we want to get joint angle information. So at the moment the model properties in the tree don't get updated when the they are changed by another client right? We can tackle this in a separate pull request.
